option1.title: WHAT IS INVESTING IN SECURITIES
option1.titl2: Investing in securities means investing in various assets - from real estate and business projects to securities and cryptocurrencies.
option1.text: Each security certifies the right of its owner to a part of property assets or confirms the fact of a loan. Securities are issued in standard paper form or in electronic form.

option2.title: TYPES OF INVESTMENT
option2.titl2: The type of security itself can already indicate potential income. Among the most common financial instruments on the market, we can distinguish
option2.text: It is also possible to invest in derivative securities (options, futures and swaps). Not all types of financial instruments are available on the stock market. For example, an investor can invest in a promissory note, but such a document is traded outside stock exchanges.

stocksM.text1: STO is a faster and cheaper analogue of IPO. Listing costs are reduced due to the absence of the need to involve intermediaries like investment banks. Audit and underwriting procedures for blockchain projects are also simpler. And almost any private investor can participate in STO
stocksM.preTitle1: TOKENIZATION IS THE CREATION OF A RECORD CERTIFIING THE VOLUME OF RIGHTS TO THE OBJECT OF THE MATERIAL WORLD (WHERE THE TOKEN IS ISSUED) THE TOKEN IS REGISTERED WITH THE HELP OF DISTRIBUTED REGISTER TECHNOLOGY

blockText1.text1: Tokenized stocks are digital stock tokens that are traded on traditional stock exchanges. The value of tokenized stocks is pegged to the value of their respective underlying stocks. Let's take Apple inc. as an example.
blockText1.text2: If the value of Apple shares rises, then the value of tokenized shares will rise accordingly. If the value of Apple shares falls, the value of tokenized shares will also decrease.
blockText1.text3: The tokens are based on a pledge of shares held by the Custodian. Therefore, each tokenized share represents a stake in the respective listed company.
blockText1.text4: Ownership of tokenized shares does not transfer any shareholder rights to you. You only participate in the economic development of the underlying asset, including the payment of dividends (if any).

list3.listTitle: FOR ISSUING TOKENIZED SHARES AND SUBSEQUENTLY ATTRACTING INVESTORS BY STO:
list3.item1: Shareholders of the OJSC make a relevant decision at the AGM;
list3.item2: Transfer to the Depository some part of the OJSC shares under a pledge agreement for their subsequent digitization (shares of an additional issue may be transferred, or a part of shares already owned by shareholders).
list3.item3: Instead of frozen shares, digital tokens are issued into circulation, which will confirm to its holder the same rights as the share.
list3.item4: Issued tokens are placed among investors in the trading system of the digital exchange.

realEstateMarket.title: REAL ESTATE SECTOR
realEstateMarket.preTitle2: MORTGAGE SECURITIES LIQUIDITY FOR BANKS ORGANIZED MARKET

list1.title: WHAT PROBLEMS IT SOLVES
list1.item1: Sales of property at the best price on the desired date
list1.item2: Guarantee of performance of obligations by the parties
list1.item3: Guarantee of payment of commission to the intermediary
list1.item4: Ability to bid from anywhere in the world
list1.item6: Decrease in property value as a result of bidding

textBlock.text1: The minimum amount of the Guarantee amount is set at 50,000 (fifty thousand) soms. The upper limit for the Guarantee amount is not limited.
textBlock.text2: The auction takes place entirely in electronic form. Participants see the current information on the Auction on the screens of their devices, using the program functionality they are given the opportunity to participate in each step of the Auction. Participants are automatically assigned numbers or they indicate their name on their own.
textBlock.text3: The Auction is considered completed if there is at least one Buyer admitted to the Auction and taking part in it.
textBlock.text4: The Exchange has the right to instruct the Intermediary (Realtor) for a fee to carry out work on the preparation / examination of a package of documents submitted to the Auction by the Organizer with the determination of the result of the work done (examination).

realEstateMarket.text: ― a type of secondary securities that serve as a universal tool for refinancing investments in housing construction, that is, a means for short-term recovery of financial injections into residential properties that are purchased on the market through mortgages. At the same time, securities maintain the stability of refinancing mortgage construction through the fact that the return of funds to the investor is carried out within a period shorter than the maturity of the mortgage loan amount.
